categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: Fixer 88 was the codename of a female Chiss who worked as a Fixer in the employ of Imperial Intelligence during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. She was stationed aboard Vaiken Spacedock.

Fixer 88 appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as a PvP gear vendor for the Imperial Agent class on Vaiken Spacedock. A later update changed her armor, mistakenly rendering her exposed skin as a Human's. She was later removed in Game Update 5.0 on November 29, 2016, which retired the PvP and PvE gear vendors in favor of the Command system.
